Extend Your Life
“Money does not buy you freedom. Time does.”
INFLUENCE TODAY INFLUENCE THIS WEEK WHOLE TIME SPAN IN HOURS
minutes hours years yesterday hours won years won In minutes: Daily average: week
Won time Lost time Share Share your progress with your friends Share your stats with your friends CLOSE Understood Influence Frequency My life expectancy I have extended my life expectancy: Go try it on your own: My new life expectancy: LAST TIME never Previous life expectancy Achievable life expectancy TODAY
Your won hours will be displayed here. Click it for more information on your progress and life expectancy. Click on one of these categories to track your daily behavior and how it affects your life expectancy. This graph shows how many hours you have won in the last 5 days. Swipe right to access settings, privacy policy, and more.
Going outside Today's Mood Please rate the following activities by their importance in your life (5 = important) Please enter your year of birth Sport Smoking Nutrition Height (cm) Weight (kg) male female countries Life expectancy: Please enter your gender and country
How much did you smoke? How much sport did you do today? How healthy have you eaten today? How much time did you spend outside? How was your overall mood today?

Developed by Felix Hoppe 
 
 Disclaimer:
 
 The data in this app that relates to your life expectancy is based solely on statistics, so that only averages can be formed. Your actual life expectancy depends on many circumstances that can not be handled in this app. The statistics are based on scientific studies that cover the impact of the activities mentioned in the app on life expectancy. The studies used in this app are listed in the licenses. I assume no liability for the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the data. All claims for damages in connection with decisions and actions resulting from this app are also excluded. 

Is my app helpful? If my app helps you in everyday life, please take a moment to rate it.
 It helps me a lot spreading this app so that other people can benefit from it too.

// App Intro Goals Statistics Improve your health Overcome obstacles Future
The easiest way to accomplish your goals!
By showing you how some behaviors affect your lifespan drasticly, your willing to make changes more easily. Stay motivated by keeping track of your progress. Reach your optimal shape by exercising more and eating healthier. This App helps you accomplish your biggest obstacles. All to help you become the best version of yourself. Live a longer, healthier and happier life.
